_miniDumpDirectory: Remove _ and provide EXISTING directory for mini dumps
_logPath: Remove _ and provide path to log
_pathToPlugins: Remove _ and provide path to plugins
_pathToDependencies: Remove _ and provide path to dependencies
_forceAdapter: Remove _ and set to string 1 to simulate a headless system (no graphics adapters), and to a hex string number vendor PCI ID to simulate a single adapter system
_forceArchitecture: If forceAdapter is set to a PCI ID, Remove _ and set to a hex string arch number for vendor
